message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the synthesis reaction of magnesium oxide (MgO) from its constituent elements, magnesium (Mg) and oxygen (O2)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the synthesis reaction of magnesium oxide (MgO) from its constituent elements, magnesium (Mg) and oxygen (O2) is:

2 Mg + O2 â†’ 2 MgO
